_sText:
Hello everyone,

This is Jailbreakmap: Ba_jail_american_v4.

It's a map based on an american jail, with multiple things to do like:

Swimming pool
Race swimming
Bubblebath
Basketball
Football
Car garage
Training ground
3 Watchtower
A helicopter
A electric chair
EVEN HELL!
and some more awesome things!



To add the map to your CSS follow the next instructions:

Go to start
Search: Steamapps
Open steamapps
Open the map with your account name
Open map: Counter-strike Source
Open map: Cstrike
Open map: Maps
Copy and paste the Ba_jail_american_v4.bsp and the .bsp.bak file in here.
Open Counter-strike: Source with console
Type: map ba_jail_american_v4 and hit enter

Have a look around and please share this map with your friends :)

Have fun with it!

Eazy Jay
